## FlagProvider

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/flags/FlagProvider.ts" sourceLine="8" packageName="commandkit" />

Interface for external feature flag providers.
Implement this interface to integrate with external flag management systems
like LaunchDarkly, Split, Unleash, etc.

```ts title="Signature"
interface FlagProvider {
    initialize?(): MaybePromise<void>;
    getFlag(key: string, context?: any): MaybePromise<FlagConfiguration | null>;
    hasFlag(key: string): MaybePromise<boolean>;
    destroy?(): MaybePromise<void>;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### initialize

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/maybe-promise#maybepromise'>MaybePromise</a>&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Initialize the provider (e.g., establish connections, load initial config)
### getFlag

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string, context?: any) => <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/maybe-promise#maybepromise'>MaybePromise</a>&#60;<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/flag-configuration#flagconfiguration'>FlagConfiguration</a> | null&#62;`}   />

Get the current value/configuration for a feature flag
### hasFlag

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/maybe-promise#maybepromise'>MaybePromise</a>&#60;boolean&#62;`}   />

Check if a flag exists in the external system
### destroy

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/maybe-promise#maybepromise'>MaybePromise</a>&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Cleanup resources when the provider is no longer needed
